column1: Jp
column2: En

column1:
ほうほう！　なるほどな！
竜の与えし力により生まれた
新たなる技を欲するかッ！
column2:
Hoh hoh! I see! You seek new techniques
born from the dragon's bestowed power!

column1:
ぬおおおおお！　おぬしの大剣が
おぬしの筋肉が、強者の高みへと昇りたがっている！
感じるぞ、その熱意をッ！
column2:
Nuuuoooooh! Your greatsword and your
muscles yearn to ascend to the heights of
the strong! I can feel your passion!

column1:
このオリバー、その心意気に応じ
共に戦場を駆けておぬしを導こうぞッ！
試練の場に来るがよいッ！
column2:
This Oliver shall answer your resolve
and guide you through the battlefield!
Come to the trial grounds!

column1:
試練の場の＜<STG 587>＞だが
<AREA 9>のエリアランクが
十分でなければ入ることすらできんぞ！
おぬしはすでに試されておるのだッ！
column2:
<STG 587> is the trial grounds,
but if your <AREA 9> area rank isn't
high enough, you won't even be able
to enter! This too is a test!

column1:
このオリバー、その心意気に応じ
共に戦場を駆けておぬしを導こうぞッ！
試練の場に来るがよいッ！
遠慮することはない、さぁッ！
column2:
This Oliver shall answer your resolve
and guide you through the battlefield!
Come to the trial grounds!
Do not hesitate, now!

column1:
試練の場の＜<STG 587>＞だが
<AREA 9>のエリアランクが
十分でなければ入ることすらできんぞ！
おぬしはすでに試されておるのだッ！
column2:
<STG 587> is the trial grounds,
but if your <AREA 9> area rank isn't
high enough, you won't even be able
to enter! This too is a test!

column1:
おおお、来たかッ！
共に参らん、頂きへと向かう試練の道をッ！
column2:
Oooh, you've come! Let us tread the path
of trials leading to the summit together!

column1: さぁさぁ！　叩き潰し、砕き散らして進まんッ！
column2:
Come now, come now! 
Crush, shatter, and smash your way forward!

column1: さて、死合おうぞ！！
column2: Now, we shall fight with our lives on the line!!

column1: むむ――歯ごたえ不足ッ！　さらなる敵の元へいざゆかん！
column2:
Hmm... Not enough bite! 
Now, onward to the next enemy!

column1: 第二の試練！　剛剣を振るうのだッ！
column2:
The second trial!
Swing your mighty sword!

column1: 次が最後の試練ぞッ！　期待が高まるだろう！
column2:
This is the last trial! 
The anticipation is building!

column1: 括目して見よッ！　あやつが最後の試練ッ！
column2:
Widen your eyes and behold! 
That one is the final trial!

column1:
うむ、うむうむうむ！！
あの奥義を使うにふさわしき眼光よ！
よしッ！　我が逗留先に戻り
新たなる戦技を継承しようではないか！
column2:
Hmm, hmm hmm hmm!!
Such piercing eyes worthy of using that
secret technique! Very well! Let us return
to my dwelling and bestow a new combat
skill!

column1:
うむ、うむうむうむ！！
あの奥義を使うにふさわしき眼光よ！
このオリバーが認めし剣士の業を感じるわッ！
column2:
Hmm, hmm hmm hmm!!
That gaze is worthy of using that secret technique!
I sense the work of a swordsman Oliver himself
acknowledges!

column1:
よしッ！　我が逗留先に戻り
新たなる戦技を継承しようではないか！
column2:
Very well! Let us return to my abode
and bestow new combat skills!

column1:
全てを打ち砕く力の豪流たるウォリアーの剣
この戦技でさらに冴え渡ろう！
継承するがよいッ！
真の強者への覇道を邁進するのだッ！
column2:
The sword of the Warrior, a torrent of
power that shatters all! With this combat
skill, let your edge grow keener! Inherit
it! March forth on the path to true
strength!

column1: フハハハハッ！　戦場を駆けるこの喜びッ！
column2:
Fuhahahaha! 
The joy of charging across the battlefield!

column1: 剣士に盾など不要！　痛みも闘志の糧とするのだッ！
column2:
A swordsman needs no shield! Let pain
fuel your fighting spirit!

column1: 最強の強者を目指し、死合う！　これぞ本分！
column2:
Strive to become the strongest warrior,
and fight to the death! This is our true calling!

column1: おぬし、よい顔をしているぞッ！
column2: That's the face of a champion!

column1: ウォリアーなれば、目の前の敵にぶつかり叩き潰すが本懐！
column2:
A Warrior's purpose is to clash with and
crush the enemy before them!

column1: 敵の攻撃タイミングを見極めッ！　身構えろッ！
column2: Gauge the enemy's attack timing! Brace yourself!

column1: 食らいつき、薙ぎ払い、打ち砕くッ！
column2: Bite down, cleave through, and smash them apart!

column1: 痛いか！？　その怒りを大剣に込めて振り下ろすのだッ！
column2:
Does it hurt?! Channel that anger into
your greatsword and strike!

column1: 振りかぶり、叩き下ろせッ！
column2: Swing high and bring it down!

column1: 受けた痛みは倍返しだッ！　敵を叩き潰せッ！！
column2: Return the pain twofold! Crush the enemy!!
